import React, { useRef } from 'react' import back_icon from '../../assets/back-icon.png' import food1 from '../../assets/food1.jpg' import food2 from '../../assets/food2.jpg' import food3 from '../../assets/food3.jpg' import next_icon from '../../assets/next-icon.png' import './hero.css' function Hero() { const slider = useRef(); let tx = 0; const slideForward = () => { if (tx > -50) { tx -= 25; } slider.current.style.transform = `translateX(${tx}%)` } const slideBackward = () => { if (tx < 0) { tx += 25; } slider.current.style.transform = `translateX(${tx}%)`; } return (

Bringing smiles to Millions

) } export default Hero;
